nodes.text: Sena Pakkallo was a medical doctor who served the Galactic Empire during and prior to the Galactic Civil War. During the course of her career, she was posted to a number of undesirable planets and she grew disillusioned by the requirements of her profession. She later defected to the Rebel Alliance after its intervention at Bakura.
Pakallo was a medical supervisor. She served on the Outer Rim agriworld Reuss VIII for a short time, providing hygiene instructions to locals.
